description: A textured grey fabric fedora featuring a classic pinched crown and a contrasting black ribbon band.
LA woven brown straw hat with a black band, pictured poolside for a relaxed, summery style.
A dark grey woven straw fedora with a wide black ribbon band and a short, upturned brim.
A simple, casual cream-colored bucket hat made of cotton canvas with a stitched, downward-sloping brim.
